critical_issue_1_learner_registration.user_report: Learner registration with class_type not working
evidence: Backend API accepts class_type field and returns 200 status
Frontend form has class_type dropdown with all three options (Digital, Face-to-Face, Both)
Registration successfully creates learner with class_type stored
All three cohort pages load with complete data (1100+ characters each)
Each cohort has UNIQUE data as designed (different keywords, drop-off rates, at-risk learners)
Cohort 1 (VET): Keywords include 'practical, relevant, helpful' - 4 learners at risk
Cohort 2 (First Nations): Keywords include 'cultural, inclusive, respectful' - 1 learner at risk
Cohort 3 (Other): Keywords include 'confusing, stuck, difficult' - 5 learners at risk
All sections present: Learner Journey, Sentiment Analysis, At-Risk table, Engagement Heatmap, Trainer Metrics
